nodes.text: Milessa Arranda was a Human female from Alderaan, and the mother of Tash and Zak Arranda.

Milessa Arranda was born and raised on Alderaan, and married Kalf Arranda. Milessa and Kalf eventually raised two children, Tash and Zak. In 0 BBY, she and her husband sent their children away from their world for what was intended to be a brief vacation. During the children's absence, Milessa was killed along with every other person on the planet, when Grand Moff Tarkin used the Death Star to destroy Alderaan as an example of Imperial might.
